  • Method Details

    • saveContacts

      protected void saveContacts(Map<String,List<String>> contacts)
      This is a function that saves all data in an external file

    • loadContacts

      protected void loadContacts(Map<String,List<String>> contacts)
      This is a function that loads the data from an external file. During the process, the integrity of the file is also checked

    • listCommands

      protected void listCommands()
      This is a function that returns a main menu. It's shows all the commands that a user can run in the program.

    • listContacts

      protected void listContacts(Map<String,List<String>> contacts)
      This is a function that returns a list of all entries in the book. In case there is no record in the book, a detailed message appears. In addition, there is a function of sorting the name values in reverse order.

    • showContact

      protected void showContact(Map<String,List<String>> contacts, Scanner input)
      This is a function that displays the phone number by contact name

    • findContact

      protected void findContact(Map<String,List<String>> contacts, Scanner input)
      This is a function where you can search a name by user number. And also what a user wants to do with the value that found after a search

    • addContact

      protected void addContact(Map<String,List<String>> contacts, Scanner input)
      His is a function that adds a new number. At this stage, we check how many characters are in the name In addition, a typed phone number is also checked

    • editContact

      protected void editContact(Map<String,List<String>> contacts, Scanner input)
      This is a function where you can edit a number by name. In addition, it is checked whether a typed name exists in the file And also what a user wants to do with the value that found after a search

    • deleteContact

      protected void deleteContact(Map<String,List<String>> contacts, Scanner input)
      This is a function that deletes a number from the phone book. There is a validation check to see if the name exists in the phone book.

    • main

      protected void main()
